name: noesis-2
description: KI-gest√ºtzte Plattform im Rahmen der betrieblichen Mitbestimmung

scripts.jobs:migrate: docker compose -f docker-compose.yml -f docker-compose.dev.yml run --build --rm migrate
scripts.jobs:bootstrap: docker compose -f docker-compose.yml -f docker-compose.dev.yml run --build --rm bootstrap
scripts.jobs:rag: docker compose -f docker-compose.yml -f docker-compose.dev.yml run --rm rag-schema
scripts.jobs:rag:health: docker compose -f docker-compose.yml -f docker-compose.dev.yml run --rm rag-health
scripts.dev:init: npm run jobs:migrate && npm run jobs:bootstrap && npm run jobs:rag
scripts.dev:reset: docker compose -f docker-compose.yml -f docker-compose.dev.yml down -v && docker compose -f docker-compose.yml -f docker-compose.dev.yml build --no-cache --pull && docker compose -f docker-compose.yml -f docker-compose.dev.yml up -d && npm run dev:init && npm run dev:check
scripts.win:jobs:rag: docker compose -f docker-compose.yml -f docker-compose.dev.yml run --rm rag-schema
scripts.win:jobs:rag:health: docker compose -f docker-compose.yml -f docker-compose.dev.yml run --rm rag-health
scripts.test:py: docker compose -f docker-compose.dev.yml run --rm web sh -c "pip install -r requirements.txt -r requirements-dev.txt && python -m pytest -q"
scripts.test:py:parallel: docker compose -f docker-compose.dev.yml run --rm web sh -c "pip install -r requirements.txt -r requirements-dev.txt && DJANGO_SETTINGS_MODULE=noesis2.settings.test_parallel python -m pytest -q -m 'not slow' -n auto --dist=loadgroup --reuse-db && PYTEST_XDIST_WORKER=gw0 DJANGO_SETTINGS_MODULE=noesis2.settings.test_parallel python -m pytest -q -m 'slow' --reuse-db"
scripts.test:py:all: docker compose -f docker-compose.dev.yml run --rm web sh -c "pip install -r requirements.txt -r requirements-dev.txt && PII_MODE=gold AI_CORE_TEST_DATABASE_URL=${AI_CORE_TEST_DATABASE_URL:-postgresql://noesis2:noesis2@db:5432/noesis2_test} python -m pytest -q"
scripts.test:py:parallel:all: docker compose -f docker-compose.dev.yml run --rm web sh -c "pip install -r requirements.txt -r requirements-dev.txt && PII_MODE=gold AI_CORE_TEST_DATABASE_URL=${AI_CORE_TEST_DATABASE_URL:-postgresql://noesis2:noesis2@db:5432/noesis2_test} DJANGO_SETTINGS_MODULE=noesis2.settings.test_parallel python -m pytest -q -m 'not slow' -n auto --dist=loadgroup --reuse-db && PII_MODE=gold AI_CORE_TEST_DATABASE_URL=${AI_CORE_TEST_DATABASE_URL:-postgresql://noesis2:noesis2@db:5432/noesis2_test} PYTEST_XDIST_WORKER=gw0 DJANGO_SETTINGS_MODULE=noesis2.settings.test_parallel python -m pytest -q -m 'slow' --reuse-db"
scripts.test:py:fast: docker compose -f docker-compose.dev.yml run --rm web sh -c "pip install -r requirements.txt -r requirements-dev.txt && python -m pytest -q -m 'not slow'"
scripts.test:py:unit: docker compose -f docker-compose.dev.yml run --rm web sh -c "pip install -r requirements.txt -r requirements-dev.txt && python -m pytest -q -m 'not django_db'"
scripts.test:py:cov: docker compose -f docker-compose.dev.yml run --rm web sh -c "pip install -r requirements.txt -r requirements-dev.txt && python -m pytest -q --cov=ai_core --cov=common --cov=customers --cov=documents --cov=organizations --cov=profiles --cov=projects --cov=users --cov=theme --cov=noesis2 --cov-report=term-missing"
scripts.test:py:clean: docker compose -f docker-compose.dev.yml run --rm web sh -c "pip install --no-cache-dir -r requirements.txt -r requirements-dev.txt && python -m pytest -q"
scripts.chromatic: echo "Add Chromatic or Percy command here"
